President Obama was not born in Kenya. There may be a Russian asset in the White House. Climate change is real. And there are not fine people on both sides.

FACTS.

text:
A national #paidleave standard should be:
Inclusive
Comprehensive
Meaningful
Sustainable
Secure
The #FAMILYAct is only legislation before Congress that aligns with these principles.pic.twitter.com/z94hJ8pcir

html: #Paidleave means the freedom to start a family if, when and how you choose. And it should be available to all women and working people, no matter where you live or work. #FAMILYAct
text: #Paidleave means the freedom to start a family if, when and how you choose. And it should be available to all women and working people, no matter where you live or work. #FAMILYAct

html: The #FAMILYAct would guarantee #paidleave for moms and dads (and many others!). A national #paidleave policy would shift #caregiving norms and making workplaces more equitable and family friendly.pic.twitter.com/bxR00Ran7x
